    let containerSize = layoutConfig.containerW * screen.width / layoutConfig.wideW;
    return containerSize / layoutConfig.containerW;
  }

  function setScaleFactor() {
    let scalingFactor;
    let scalingWidth = 'device-width';
    let orientation = screen.msOrientation || screen.mozOrientation || (screen.orientation || {}).type;
    if ((window.matchMedia("(orientation: portrait)").matches) || window.orientation === 0
      || orientation === "portrait-secondary" || orientation === "portrait-primary") {

      if (screen.width > 768) {
        let layoutConfigPortrait = { containerW: 1024, wideW: 1366 };
        scalingFactor = calcScaleFactor(layoutConfigPortrait);
        scalingFactor = screen.width / layoutConfigPortrait.containerW;
      } else {
        let layoutConfigPortrait = { containerW: 600, wideW: 1024 };
        scalingFactor = calcScaleFactor(layoutConfigPortrait);
      }
      scalingWidth = 1024;
    } else {
      if (screen.width > 1024) {
        let layoutConfigLandscape = { containerW: 1136, wideW: 1440 };
        scalingFactor = calcScaleFactor(layoutConfigLandscape);
      } else {
        let layoutConfigPortrait = { containerW: 1024, wideW: 1136 };
        scalingFactor = calcScaleFactor(layoutConfigPortrait);
        scalingFactor = screen.width / layoutConfigPortrait.containerW;
      }
      scalingWidth = 1200;
    }
    if (scalingFactor) {
      Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('meta')).forEach(function (el) {
        if (el.getAttribute('name') === 'viewport') {
          el.setAttribute('content', 'width=' + scalingWidth + '');
        }
      });
    }
  }

  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
    if (window.innerWidth <= 1024) {
      setScaleFactor();
    }
  });

  window.addEventListener('orientationchange', function () {
    if (window.innerWidth <= 1024) {
      setTimeout(() => {
        setScaleFactor();
      }, 100);
    }
  });</script><script type="module">import {Workbox} from 'https://storage.googleapis.com/workbox-cdn/releases/6.2.0/workbox-window.prod.mjs';

  
  if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
    const wb = new Workbox('/sw_desktop.js');
    wb.register().then(registration => {

                                <div class="media-content">
                                    
                                        
    
     


    



    



    



    



    


                        
                                    
                                    <h4 class="title-art-hp is-xsmall is-line-h-11" rcs-mobile-allow-br="">
                                        
                                            

                                        <a class="has-text-black " id="m14111-14110-14112" href="https://video.corriere.it/cronaca/approfondimenti/elezioni-in-romania-l-estrema-destra-e-putin-ci-riprovano/ca4b94a3-d330-422b-8bb9-036ecdfa1xlk">Elezioni in Romania: l'estrema destra (e Putin) ci riprovano</a><br class=" has-text-primary"><a class="has-text-black " id="m14111-14110-14112" href="https://video.corriere.it/cronaca/approfondimenti/elezioni-in-romania-l-estrema-destra-e-putin-ci-riprovano/ca4b94a3-d330-422b-8bb9-036ecdfa1xlk"></a>

            <div data-include-and-mark-used="true" class="single-media " data-draggable="true" rcs-transparent-mobile="" id="m2432-2431-2433">
            




    


































    




            <div class="bck-media-news el-show-desktop-only " data-page-id="1139978" style=" display:block;" data-track-zone-name="">
                <div class="media-news__content">
                    
                        
    
     


    



    



    



    



    <span class="overtitle-art is-small-black is-mr-b-8 has-text-grey" data-is-scheduled-supratitle-active="">
        
        <a class="lead-category" style="display: none;" href="https://www.corriere.it/economia/aziende/25_maggio_01/startup-in-italia-solo-il-7-ce-la-fa-perche-puo-essere-utile-investire-subito-in-impianti-e-macchinari-0d7e1cdc-fe9f-4569-b1a7-dc4ab2ddfxlk.shtml"></a>
    <span class="" id="m2470-2469-2471">

            

            

        

            

            

            

            <div>
                
            <span class="overtitle-art is-small-black is-mr-b-8 has-text-grey">lanalisi</span></div>
        </span></span>


                    
                    <h4 class="title-art-hp is-medium is-line-h-106" rcs-mobile-allow-br="">
                        

                    <a class="has-text-black " id="m2478-2477-2479" href="https://www.corriere.it/economia/aziende/25_maggio_01/startup-in-italia-solo-il-7-ce-la-fa-perche-puo-essere-utile-investire-subito-in-impianti-e-macchinari-0d7e1cdc-fe9f-4569-b1a7-dc4ab2ddfxlk.shtml">Startup, in Italia solo il 7% ce la fa: perch pu essere utile investire (subito) in impianti e macchinari</a></h4>
                    <div class="media is-mr-t-12">
                        <div class="media-content">
                            <figure class="media-left image has-media" style="display: block;">

            <span class="overtitle-art is-small-black is-mr-b-8 has-text-grey-dusty">lutti</span></div>
        </span></span>


                    
                                            <h4 class="title-art-hp is-line-h-106 is-medium" rcs-mobile-allow-br="">
                            

                        <a class="has-text-black " id="m3941-3940-3942" href="https://www.corriere.it/cultura/25_maggio_01/rosetta-siesto-morta-moglie-andrea-camilleri-lo-scrittore-era-la-spina-dorsale-mia-esistenza-dc2ae960-2664-11f0-abff-e4232084a757.shtml">Rosetta Dello Siesto, morta la moglie di Andrea Camilleri. Per lo scrittore era la spina dorsale della mia esistenza</a></h4>
                    
                    
                        
                    <span class="author-art is-xsmall-it is-mr-t-15 " id="m3946-3945-3947">di Jessica Chia</span>
                    <p class="subtitle-art is-mr-t-8">
                        
                    <a class="has-text-grey-dove " id="m3951-3950-3952" href="https://www.corriere.it/cultura/25_maggio_01/rosetta-siesto-morta-moglie-andrea-camilleri-lo-scrittore-era-la-spina-dorsale-mia-esistenza-dc2ae960-2664-11f0-abff-e4232084a757.shtml">Milanese, la donna aveva conosciuto il padre di Montalbano in occasione del suo debutto teatrale nel 1953. Dal loro matrimonio, avvenuto nel 1957, sono nate le figlie Andreina, Mariolina ed Elisabetta. La donna aveva 97 anni</a></p>
                    
                    
                        

                    
                </div>
             </div>         </div>

                    <span class="author-art is-xsmall-it is-mr-t-15 " id="m16314-16313-16315">di Micol Sarfatti</span>
                    <p class="subtitle-art is-mr-t-8">
                        
                    <a class="has-text-grey-dove " id="m16319-16318-16320" href="https://www.corriere.it/podcast/ultima-volonta-testamenti-italiani/25_aprile_29/i-migliori-eredi-dell-uomo-8da63e34-2501-11f0-8212-673da95e4526.shtml">Oltre a essere fedeli amici delluomo, gli animali domestici sono da sempre una fonte di ispirazione per larte, e ora anche per la moda. E come vi raccontiamo in questo episodio, spesso sono anche gli inconsapevoli beneficiari di eredit milionarie.</a></p>

         <h4 class="overtitle-art-text is-small-sd-l has-text-grey-dove">
            <a class="has-text-grey-dove" href="https://www.corriere.it/opinioni/">EDITORIALI <span class="icon has-text-b-umber"><i class="icon-corriere-andEditoriali fa-1x"></i></span>COMMENTI</a>

                            </a>
                        </figure>
                        
                            
                        <span class="author-art is-xsmall-it " id="m20716-20715-20717">di Federico Berni</span>
                        <p class="subtitle-art">
                            
                        <a class="has-text-grey-dove " id="m20721-20720-20722" href="https://milano.corriere.it/notizie/cronaca/25_aprile_30/cosparge-l-amante-di-alcol-e-le-da-fuoco-vedrai-che-bella-sorpresa-stasera-moriremo-insieme-arrestato-37enne-c4cae4c5-b326-4af4-ab35-9122f679fxlk.shtml">La donna  stata trovata dai carabinieri in via Damiano Chiesa, a Sesto Giovanni, con ustioni di primo e secondo grado al ventre e al petto. Ha cercato di darmi fuoco, ha raccontato scioccata. L'uomo  stato arrestato</a></p>
                        
                                
                        
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div></div></div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="list-items-arguments">

                <div class="media is-mr-t-12">

        <div class="media-news__header">
            
                
            <span class="overtitle-art is-small-black has-text-grey-dusty " id="m870-869-871">l'intervista</span>
        </div>
        <div class="media-news__image">
            <figure class="image has-media" manipulate-video-config-template="dwc" data-video-id="3663618c-b255-46ee-81bf-867fcafbcxlk" data-video-source="corriere" data-video-source-id="3663618c-b255-46ee-81bf-867fcafbcxlk" autoplay="false" sticky="false">
                <a href="https://video.corriere.it/roma/ermal-meta-e-il-backstage-del-concertone-e-un-onore-condurre-ma-quanta-responsabilita/3663618c-b255-46ee-81bf-867fcafbcxlk">
                    <div class="shadowBkgPhoto">
                        <img loading="lazy" width="254" height="142" alt="E un grande piacere e un grande onore, ma anche una grande responsabilit. Traghettare un concerto cos lungo non  cosa facile. Per fortuna ho al mio fianco delle meravigliose compagne, racconta Ermal Meta nel backstage del Concertone del Primo maggio in piazza San Giovanni in Laterano. Il cantautore  alla conduzione per la seconda volta, del grande evento musicale di oggi con Noemi, BigMama e Vincenzo Schettini. Sul palco tante star del panorama musicale nazionale come Giorgia, Elodie, Achille Lauro e tanti tanti altri, che proporranno le loro grandi hit dalle 15e30 e fino a oltre la mezzanotte. Il Primo maggio ci ha da sempre proposto una grande panoramica sulla musica nazionale del momento, e non solo  prosegue Meta.- Penso sar un bellissimo Concertone. Il cantautore ha pubblicato da pochi giorni un nuovo brano Ferma gli orologi ed  in tour nei teatri dItalia con il suo nuovo spettacolo. E dal 13 maggio, sar in libreria con il suo secondo romanzo Le camelie invernali. Mi sono davvero appassionato molto a questa nuova mia dimensione. Scrivere  anche tanto terapeutico, conclude lartista. (Max Pucciariello)" src="https://dimages2.corriereobjects.it/files/image_385_215/uploads/2025/05/01/6812de45ce57c.jpeg" data-full-src="https://dimages2.corriereobjects.it/uploads/2025/05/01/6812de45ce57c.jpeg">
                    </div>
                </a>
            </figure>
        </div>
        <div class="media-news__content">

	<div class="media-news__content is-paddingless">
		<div class="media">
            <figure class="media-left image has-media" style="display: block;">

			<div class="media-content">
                
                    
<span class="overtitle-art is-small-black is-mr-b-8 has-text-grey-dusty">
  

    <a class="lead-category" style="display: none;" href="https://www.corriere.it/animali/25_aprile_29/esce-dal-bar-e-taglia-di-netto-la-coda-al-suo-cane-con-un-coltello-lui-denunciato-l-animale-ora-e-in-cura-c5e31dd8-3613-47a8-ab0b-e2fd50a48xlk.shtml"></a>
<span class="" id="m11172-11171-11173">

     

    

    

        
        

        <div>
            
        <span class="lead-category-normal default">Modena</span></div>

    </span></span>

                

				<h4 class="title-art-hp is-line-h-106 is-medium">
                    

                <a class="has-text-black " id="m11180-11179-11181" href="https://www.corriere.it/animali/25_aprile_29/esce-dal-bar-e-taglia-di-netto-la-coda-al-suo-cane-con-un-coltello-lui-denunciato-l-animale-ora-e-in-cura-c5e31dd8-3613-47a8-ab0b-e2fd50a48xlk.shtml">Esce dal bar e taglia di netto la coda al suo cane con un coltello. Lui denunciato, il povero Max ora  in cura</a></h4>

                
                    
                <span class="author-art is-xsmall-it is-mr-t-15 " id="m11185-11184-11186">di Alessandro Sala</span>
                <p class="subtitle-art is-mr-t-8">
                    
                <a class="has-text-grey-dove " id="m11190-11189-11191" href="https://www.corriere.it/animali/25_aprile_29/esce-dal-bar-e-taglia-di-netto-la-coda-al-suo-cane-con-un-coltello-lui-denunciato-l-animale-ora-e-in-cura-c5e31dd8-3613-47a8-ab0b-e2fd50a48xlk.shtml">Non si sa per quale motivo l'uomo abbia compiuto il terribile gesto. L'animale, sanguinante e impaurito,  stato soccorso dalle guardie zoofile dell'Oipa e  portato in una localit sicura</a></p>

                <div class="media-group-news is--medium">
                    <div class="bck-media-divider">
                        
                    <div class="media-divider__content mezza-apertura " id="m11143-11142-11144">

    

<div class="single-media " id="m11238-11237-11239">

                    




    























        
        <div class="bck-media-news" data-track-zone-name="">
                        <div class="media-news__content">
                
                    
<span class="overtitle-art is-small-black is-mr-b-12 has-text-grey-dusty">
  

    <a class="lead-category" style="display: none;" href="https://www.corriere.it/animali/25_aprile_28/dalla-nidificazione-delle-nitticore-al-ritorno-del-lupo-cosi-da-una-discarica-e-nata-l-oasi-wwf-di-ripa-bianca-78949565-e823-4c2a-ab30-0c231228cxlk.shtml"></a>
<span class="" id="m11276-11275-11277">

     

    

    

        
        

        <div>
            
        <span class="lead-category-normal default">L'area protetta</span></div>

    </span></span>

                
                <h4 class="title-art-hp is-medium is-line-h-106">
                    

                <a class="has-text-black " id="m11284-11283-11285" href="https://www.corriere.it/animali/25_aprile_28/dalla-nidificazione-delle-nitticore-al-ritorno-del-lupo-cosi-da-una-discarica-e-nata-l-oasi-wwf-di-ripa-bianca-78949565-e823-4c2a-ab30-0c231228cxlk.shtml">Dalla nidificazione delle nitticore al ritorno del lupo: cos da una discarica  nata l'Oasi Wwf di Ripa Bianca</a></h4>
                <div class="media is-mr-t-12">
                    <div class="media-content">
                        <figure class="media-left image has-media" style="display: block;">

                            </a>
                        </figure>

<span class="overtitle-art is-small-black is-mr-b-12 has-text-grey-dusty">

        </div>

                <h4 class="title-art-hp is-medium is-line-h-106">
                    

                <a class="has-text-black " id="m10814-10813-10815" href="https://corrierefiorentino.corriere.it/notizie/cronaca/25_maggio_01/castello-di-sammezzano-la-famiglia-moretti-conferma-l-acquisto-si-tra-un-mese-sara-ufficiale-9fffa7d1-71bc-4527-86fc-1dcae276cxlk.shtml">Castello di Sammezzano, Moretti conferma: S, tra un mese sar nostro</a></h4>
                <div class="media is-mr-t-12">
                    <div class="media-content">
                        <figure class="media-left image has-media" style="display: block;">
                            <a href="https://corrierefiorentino.corriere.it/notizie/cronaca/25_maggio_01/castello-di-sammezzano-la-famiglia-moretti-conferma-l-acquisto-si-tra-un-mese-sara-ufficiale-9fffa7d1-71bc-4527-86fc-1dcae276cxlk.shtml" class="image is-115x86">

                                <span class="icon-shadow has-text-white is-medium" player-icon="false" is-mobile="false" overlay-desc="false" style="visibility: hidden;">
    
</span>                            </a>
                        </figure>
                        
                            
                        <span class="author-art is-xsmall-it " id="m10819-10818-10820">di Jacopo Storni</span>
                        <p class="subtitle-art">
                            
                        <a class="has-text-grey-dove " id="m10824-10823-10825" href="https://corrierefiorentino.corriere.it/notizie/cronaca/25_maggio_01/castello-di-sammezzano-la-famiglia-moretti-conferma-l-acquisto-si-tra-un-mese-sara-ufficiale-9fffa7d1-71bc-4527-86fc-1dcae276cxlk.shtml">Dopo 30 anni di abbandono, ora via al recupero e al restauro (con abbattimento dell'ecomostro) dell'edificio capolavoro di arte orientalista.     </span></span>

                

				<h4 class="title-art-hp is-line-h-106 is-medium">

                <span class="author-art is-xsmall-it is-mr-t-15 " id="m15056-15055-15057">di Enrico Caiano</span>
                <p class="subtitle-art is-mr-t-8">

Questo alfabeto  una prova</a></p>

                            </a>
                        </figure>
                        
                            
                        <span class="author-art is-xsmall-it " id="m15220-15219-15221">di Paolo Giordano</span>
                        <p class="subtitle-art">
                            
                        <a class="has-text-grey-dove " id="m15225-15224-15226" href="https://www.corriere.it/sette/25_aprile_25/groenlandia-usa-trump-6e12f56c-f01c-47c2-babf-ea4c13eeaxlk.shtml">Desideravo da tempo questo viaggio: allinizio nessuno voleva incontrarmi, c diffidenza qui verso gli "outsider", soprattutto adesso</a></p>

<div class="bck-media-news " id="m127-126-128" data-track-zone-name="">
        




    























        <div class="media-news__header">
            
                
            <span class="overtitle-art is-small-black has-text-grey-dusty " id="m375-374-376">cinema</span>
        </div>
        <div class="media-news__image">
            <figure class="image">
                <a href="https://www.corriere.it/spettacoli/cinema-serie-tv/25_aprile_29/la-pagella-del-mereghetti-piccole-rivelazioni-spiegano-societa-e-famiglia-in-giappone-voto-7-6a36bba8-5874-4190-9c8e-0a907d8aexlk.shtml">

                    </div>
                </a>
            </figure>
        </div>
        <div class="media-news__content">
            <h4 class="title-art-hp is-small is-line-h-106">

        <div>
            
        <span class="lead-category-normal default">Occupazione</span></div>

    </span></span>

                

				<h4 class="title-art-hp is-line-h-106 is-medium">
                    

                <a class="has-text-black " id="m287-286-288" href="https://www.corriere.it/economia/lavoro/cards/i-lavoratori-italiani-tristi-poco-coinvolti-e-stressati-cosa-dicono-i-dati-e-perche-manca-il-buon-lavoro/i-dati_principale.shtml">I lavoratori italiani? Tristi, poco coinvolti e stressati: cosa dicono i dati (e perch manca il buon lavoro)</a></h4>

                
                    
                <span class="author-art is-xsmall-it is-mr-t-15 " id="m292-291-293">di Diana Cavalcoli</span>
                <p class="subtitle-art is-mr-t-8">
                    
                <a class="has-text-grey-dove " id="m297-296-298" href="https://www.corriere.it/economia/lavoro/cards/i-lavoratori-italiani-tristi-poco-coinvolti-e-stressati-cosa-dicono-i-dati-e-perche-manca-il-buon-lavoro/i-dati_principale.shtml">In base ai dati raccolti in 160 Paesi, il coinvolgimento dei dipendenti a livello globale  sceso al 21% nel 2024, con i manager che hanno subito il calo maggiore. LItalia rimane fanalino di coda  in Europa</a></p>

        <div>
            
        <span class="lead-category-normal default">Imprese</span></div>

    </span></span>

                
                <h4 class="title-art-hp is-medium is-line-h-106">
                    

                <a class="has-text-black " id="m391-390-392" href="https://www.corriere.it/economia/lavoro/25_maggio_01/il-primo-maggio-delle-imprese-che-soffrono-la-mappa-delle-crisi-aziendali-in-italia.shtml">Il primo maggio delle imprese che soffrono: la mappa delle crisi aziendali in Italia (e i 20 mila lavoratori a rischio)</a></h4>
                <div class="media is-mr-t-12">
                    <div class="media-content">
                        <figure class="media-left image has-media" style="display: block;">

            <div class="media-group-news-66 has--border-b-no-pd">
                <div class="media-group-news is--medium">
                    

                <div class="bck-media-news " id="m8524-8523-8525" data-track-zone-name="">
            
    




    























    
	<div class="media-news__content is-paddingless">
		<div class="media">
            <figure class="media-left image has-media" style="display: block;">
                <a class="image is-310x230 has-media" href="https://www.corriere.it/salute/figli-genitori/bambino/25_aprile_30/il-bullismo-passa-anche-dalle-etichette-come-insegnare-ai-bambini-a-dare-il-giusto-significato-alle-parole-aa593886-be20-4ed4-a2cd-c8458d9a4xlk.shtml">

            </figure>
			<div class="media-content">
                
                    
<span class="overtitle-art is-small-black is-mr-b-8 has-text-grey-dusty">
  

    <a class="lead-category" style="display: none;" href="https://www.corriere.it/salute/figli-genitori/bambino/25_aprile_30/il-bullismo-passa-anche-dalle-etichette-come-insegnare-ai-bambini-a-dare-il-giusto-significato-alle-parole-aa593886-be20-4ed4-a2cd-c8458d9a4xlk.shtml"></a>
<span class="" id="m8572-8571-8573">

     

    

    

        
        

        <div>
            
        <span class="lead-category-normal default">figli e genitori</span></div>

    </span></span>

                

				<h4 class="title-art-hp is-line-h-106 is-medium">
                    

                <a class="has-text-black " id="m8580-8579-8581" href="https://www.corriere.it/salute/figli-genitori/bambino/25_aprile_30/il-bullismo-passa-anche-dalle-etichette-come-insegnare-ai-bambini-a-dare-il-giusto-significato-alle-parole-aa593886-be20-4ed4-a2cd-c8458d9a4xlk.shtml">Il bullismo passa anche dalle etichette: come insegnare ai bambini a dare il giusto significato alle parole?</a></h4>

                
                    
                <span class="author-art is-xsmall-it is-mr-t-15 " id="m8585-8584-8586">di Valentina Rorato</span>
                <p class="subtitle-art is-mr-t-8">
                    
                <a class="has-text-grey-dove " id="m8590-8589-8591" href="https://www.corriere.it/salute/figli-genitori/bambino/25_aprile_30/il-bullismo-passa-anche-dalle-etichette-come-insegnare-ai-bambini-a-dare-il-giusto-significato-alle-parole-aa593886-be20-4ed4-a2cd-c8458d9a4xlk.shtml">La psicologa Marta Rizzi: Tutti noi, soprattutto se genitori, dobbiamo essere coerenti con quello che diciamo. Dobbiamo porci quotidianamente lobiettivo di avere un gesto gentile nei confronti dellaltro, di noi stessi e dellambiente</a></p>

<div class="single-media " id="m11668-11667-11669">

                    




    























        
        <div class="bck-media-news" data-track-zone-name="">
                        <div class="media-news__content">
                
                    
<span class="overtitle-art is-small-black is-mr-b-12 has-text-grey-dusty">
  

    <a class="lead-category" style="display: none;" href="https://www.corriere.it/politica/25_aprile_30/friuli-venezia-giulia-scontro-sul-terzo-mandato-la-lega-incalza-gli-alleati-de6174a6-ec76-4149-8d6b-598fa4a1exlk.shtml"></a>

        </div>

    </span></span>

                
                <h4 class="title-art-hp is-medium is-line-h-106">
                    

                <a class="has-text-black " id="m11714-11713-11715" href="https://www.corriere.it/politica/25_aprile_30/friuli-venezia-giulia-scontro-sul-terzo-mandato-la-lega-incalza-gli-alleati-de6174a6-ec76-4149-8d6b-598fa4a1exlk.shtml">Friuli Venezia-Giulia, scontro sul terzo mandato. La Lega incalza gli alleati</a></h4>
                <div class="media is-mr-t-12">
                    <div class="media-content">
                        <figure class="media-left image has-media" style="display: block;">
                            <a class="image is-115x86" href="https://www.corriere.it/politica/25_aprile_30/friuli-venezia-giulia-scontro-sul-terzo-mandato-la-lega-incalza-gli-alleati-de6174a6-ec76-4149-8d6b-598fa4a1exlk.shtml">

                            </a>
                        </figure>
                        
                            
                        <span class="author-art is-xsmall-it " id="m11719-11718-11720">di Marco Cremonesi</span>
                        <p class="subtitle-art">

<span class="overtitle-art is-small-black is-mr-b-8 has-text-grey-dusty">
  

    <a class="lead-category" style="display: none;" href="https://www.corriere.it/tecnologia/25_aprile_27/il-battito-cardiaco-della-terra-la-micro-scossa-ogni-26-secondi-impercettibile-all-uomo-di-cui-non-si-sa-ancora-la-causa-e8b6608a-9603-4adf-aa90-018e013caxlk.shtml"></a>
<span class="" id="m5936-5935-5937">

     

    

    

        
        

        <div>
            
        <span class="lead-category-normal default">lo studio del pianeta</span></div>

    </span></span>

                

				<h4 class="title-art-hp is-line-h-106 is-medium">
                    

                <a class="has-text-black " id="m5944-5943-5945" href="https://www.corriere.it/tecnologia/25_aprile_27/il-battito-cardiaco-della-terra-la-micro-scossa-ogni-26-secondi-impercettibile-all-uomo-di-cui-non-si-sa-ancora-la-causa-e8b6608a-9603-4adf-aa90-018e013caxlk.shtml">Una micro-scossa, ogni26 secondi, impercettibile all'uomo: il mistero del battito cardiaco della Terra</a></h4>

                
                    
                <span class="author-art is-xsmall-it is-mr-t-15 " id="m5949-5948-5950">di Cristina Marrone</span>
                <p class="subtitle-art is-mr-t-8">
                    
                <a class="has-text-grey-dove " id="m5954-5953-5955" href="https://www.corriere.it/tecnologia/25_aprile_27/il-battito-cardiaco-della-terra-la-micro-scossa-ogni-26-secondi-impercettibile-all-uomo-di-cui-non-si-sa-ancora-la-causa-e8b6608a-9603-4adf-aa90-018e013caxlk.shtml">I sismometri del globo registrano un misterioso impulso eccezionalmente regolare da decenni. Oggi si sa che l'origine  Golfo di Guinea ma le cause non sono del tutto chiarite</a></p>

<div class="single-media " id="m5995-5994-5996">

                    




    























        
        <div class="bck-media-news" data-track-zone-name="">
                        <div class="media-news__content">
                
                    
<span class="overtitle-art is-small-black is-mr-b-12 has-text-grey-dusty">
  

    <a class="lead-category" style="display: none;" href="https://www.corriere.it/tecnologia/cards/il-tunnel-sottomarino-piu-lungo-al-mondo-sara-costruito-come-i-mattoncini-lego-colleghera-danimarca-e-germania/il-b-tunnel-fehmarnbelt-b_principale.shtml"></a>
<span class="" id="m6033-6032-6034">

     

    

    

        
        

        <div>
            
        <span class="lead-category-normal default">ingegneria edilizia</span></div>

    </span></span>

                
                <h4 class="title-art-hp is-medium is-line-h-106">
                    

                <a class="has-text-black " id="m6041-6040-6042" href="https://www.corriere.it/tecnologia/cards/il-tunnel-sottomarino-piu-lungo-al-mondo-sara-costruito-come-i-mattoncini-lego-colleghera-danimarca-e-germania/il-b-tunnel-fehmarnbelt-b_principale.shtml">Il tunnel sottomarino pi lungo al mondo costruito come con i Lego, dalla Danimarca alla Germania</a></h4>
                <div class="media is-mr-t-12">
                    <div class="media-content">
                        <figure class="media-left image has-media" style="display: block;">
                            <a class="image is-115x86" href="https://www.corriere.it/tecnologia/cards/il-tunnel-sottomarino-piu-lungo-al-mondo-sara-costruito-come-i-mattoncini-lego-colleghera-danimarca-e-germania/il-b-tunnel-fehmarnbelt-b_principale.shtml">
                                <img loading="lazy" width="115" height="86" alt="" src="https://dimages2.corriereobjects.it/files/image_345_258/uploads/2025/04/23/6808f6124edea.jpeg" data-full-src="https://dimages2.corriereobjects.it/uploads/2025/04/23/6808f6124edea.jpeg">
                            </a>
                        </figure>
                        
                            
                        <span class="author-art is-xsmall-it " id="m6046-6045-6047">di Cristina Marrone</span>
                        <p class="subtitle-art">
                            
                        <a class="has-text-grey-dove " id="m6051-6050-6052" href="https://www.corriere.it/tecnologia/cards/il-tunnel-sottomarino-piu-lungo-al-mondo-sara-costruito-come-i-mattoncini-lego-colleghera-danimarca-e-germania/il-b-tunnel-fehmarnbelt-b_principale.shtml">Il tunnel Fehmarnbelt sotto il Baltico sar lungo oltre 18 chilometri. Viaggeranno treni e automobili e il progetto sar completato entro il 2029</a></p>
                        
                                
                        
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

    <a class="lead-category" style="display: none;" href="https://www.corriere.it/scuola/25_aprile_29/bene-la-circolare-di-valditara-su-meno-compiti-delle-vacanze-ora-ne-aspettiamo-un-altra-contro-l-ossessione-dei-voti-0f876cc4-f081-49f6-891e-2fabd914cxlk.shtml"></a>

        <div>

    </span></span>

                

				<h4 class="title-art-hp is-line-h-106 is-medium">
                    

                <a class="has-text-black " id="m12415-12414-12416" href="https://www.corriere.it/scuola/25_aprile_29/bene-la-circolare-di-valditara-su-meno-compiti-delle-vacanze-ora-ne-aspettiamo-un-altra-contro-l-ossessione-dei-voti-0f876cc4-f081-49f6-891e-2fabd914cxlk.shtml">Bene la circolare di Valditara su meno compiti delle vacanze. Ora ne aspettiamo un'altra contro l'ossessione dei voti</a></h4>

                
                    
                <span class="author-art is-xsmall-it is-mr-t-15 " id="m12420-12419-12421">di Emiliano Sbaraglia</span>
                <p class="subtitle-art is-mr-t-8">
                    
                <a class="has-text-grey-dove " id="m12425-12424-12426" href="https://www.corriere.it/scuola/25_aprile_29/bene-la-circolare-di-valditara-su-meno-compiti-delle-vacanze-ora-ne-aspettiamo-un-altra-contro-l-ossessione-dei-voti-0f876cc4-f081-49f6-891e-2fabd914cxlk.shtml">Forse non  un caso che l'intervento del ministro sia arrivato dopo il lungo ponte di Pasqua e del 25 aprile. Al ritorno in classe tutti i miei alunni erano stremati dai compiti. Ormai anche alle elementari sono sovraccaricati</a></p>
                
                        
                <ul class="related-art-small " rcs-mobile-class="related-art" id="m12430-12429-12431">

                                    Troppi compiti e verifiche, Valditara raccomanda: Vietato assegnarli la sera prima, pi coordinamento fra i prof<span class="author-art is-inline is-mr-l-4 " rcs-mobile-class="author-art is-inline is-mr-l-4" id="m12464-12463-12465">di Orsola Riva</span></a>

<div class="single-media " id="m12509-12508-12510">

                    




    























        
        <div class="bck-media-news" data-track-zone-name="">
                        <div class="media-news__content">
                
                    
<span class="overtitle-art is-small-black is-mr-b-12 has-text-grey-dusty">
  

    <a class="lead-category" style="display: none;" href="https://www.corriere.it/scuola/25_aprile_10/scuola-il-dibattito-sulle-nuove-indicazioni-nazionali-la-valutazione-non-deve-servire-a-misurare-lo-studente-ma-la-singola-6f82b2f3-820c-4c3b-a80d-b7147b10cxlk.shtml"></a>
<span class="" id="m12547-12546-12548">

     

    

    

        
        

        <div>
            
        </div>

    </span></span>

                
                <h4 class="title-art-hp is-medium is-line-h-106">
                    

                <a class="has-text-black " id="m12555-12554-12556" href="https://www.corriere.it/scuola/25_aprile_10/scuola-il-dibattito-sulle-nuove-indicazioni-nazionali-la-valutazione-non-deve-servire-a-misurare-lo-studente-ma-la-singola-6f82b2f3-820c-4c3b-a80d-b7147b10cxlk.shtml">Indicazioni Nazionali: la valutazione non serve a misurare lo studente, ma la singola prestazione</a></h4>
                <div class="media is-mr-t-12">
                    <div class="media-content">
                        <figure class="media-left image has-media" style="display: block;">
                            <a class="image is-115x86" href="https://www.corriere.it/scuola/25_aprile_10/scuola-il-dibattito-sulle-nuove-indicazioni-nazionali-la-valutazione-non-deve-servire-a-misurare-lo-studente-ma-la-singola-6f82b2f3-820c-4c3b-a80d-b7147b10cxlk.shtml">
                                <img loading="lazy" width="115" height="86" alt="Scuola, Nuove Indicazioni Nazionali: la valutazione non deve servire a misurare lo studente, ma le singole prestazioni" src="https://dimages2.corriereobjects.it/files/image_345_258/uploads/2025/04/10/67f7feef80259.webp" data-full-src="https://dimages2.corriereobjects.it/uploads/2025/04/10/67f7feef80259.webp">
                            </a>
                        </figure>
                        
                            
                        <span class="author-art is-xsmall-it " id="m12560-12559-12561">di Anna Maria Ajello</span>
                        <p class="subtitle-art">
                            
                        <a class="has-text-grey-dove " id="m12565-12564-12566" href="https://www.corriere.it/scuola/25_aprile_10/scuola-il-dibattito-sulle-nuove-indicazioni-nazionali-la-valutazione-non-deve-servire-a-misurare-lo-studente-ma-la-singola-6f82b2f3-820c-4c3b-a80d-b7147b10cxlk.shtml">Le verifiche sono uno strumento utile in primo luogo al docente per capire come ha funzionato la sua proposta didattica, quale  stata la sua resa rispetto all'apprendimento degli studenti</a></p>

             aria-labelledby="flush-headingOne-servizi"
             data-bs-parent="#accordionMenu">

            <header class="article__header">
                
                
                
    
        <h3 class="article__title ">
            <a class="text-decoration-none" href="/stories/tarantasio/una-torre-eiffel-diversa-dal-solito-o_146394_96/">Una Torre Eiffel diversa dal solito
            </a>
        </h3>
    


                
                
    
        <div class="article__entry mb-8-impo ">
            <p >
    PARIGI Il simbolo della citt  pi alto destate


            </p>
        </div>

    </div>





        

        
        

        
    
        <h3 class="article__title title-news-medium">

            </a>

        <div class="article__entry mb-8-impo ">

            </p>

        <span class="article__time">

    <script>
    $.get("/account/ajax_login_form/?request_path=/&mobile=False", function (data) {
        
            $("#loginbar").html(data);
        

        console.log("Load was performed.");


        const dropdownTrigger = document.querySelectorAll('.js-dropdown-trigger');
        const dropdownTriggerMobile = document.getElementsByClassName('js-dropdown-trigger-mobile')[0]
        const dropdownTriggerAlt = document.querySelectorAll('.js-dropdown-trigger-alt')[0];

        const dropdownAlt = document.querySelectorAll('.js-dropdown-alt')[0];
        

        const notificationsDropdownTrigger = document.querySelectorAll('.js-dropdown-notifications-trigger')[0]
        const notificationsDropdown = document.querySelectorAll('.js-dropdown-notifications')[0]

        const hasParents = (target, parents) => {
            for (const p of $(target).parents()) {
                if (parents.some(parent => parent === p)) {
                    return true
                }
            }
            return false
        }

        document.addEventListener('click', function (event) {
            const {target} = event

            // Close dropdown notification
            if (target !== notificationsDropdownTrigger && !hasParents(target, [notificationsDropdownTrigger, notificationsDropdown])) {
                if (notificationsDropdown && notificationsDropdown.classList.contains('is-active')) {
                    notificationsDropdown.classList.remove('is-active');
                    event.preventDefault();
                }
            }

             // Close dropdown profile mobile
            if (target !== dropdownTriggerMobile && !hasParents(target, [dropdownTriggerMobile, dropdownAlt]) && !dropdownTriggerAlt) {
                // console.log("here we are")
                if (dropdownAlt && dropdownAlt.classList.contains('is-active')) {
                    console.log("rimuovo is-active da mobile")
                    dropdownAlt.classList.remove('is-active');
                    event.preventDefault();
                }
            }

            // Close dropdown profile desktop
            if (target !== dropdownTriggerAlt && !hasParents(target, [dropdownTriggerAlt, dropdownAlt]) && !dropdownTriggerMobile) {
                if (dropdownAlt && dropdownAlt.classList.contains('is-active')) {
                    console.log("rimuovo is-active da desktop")
                    dropdownAlt.classList.remove('is-active');
                    event.preventDefault();
                }
            }


        }, false);

        /**
         * Append Has dropdown to parent
         *
         * @return {Void}
         */
        dropdownTrigger.forEach(function () {
            const closestLi = dropdownTrigger[0].closest('li')

            closestLi.classList.add('has-dropdown');
        });

        /**
         * Profile dropdown desktop.
         *
         * @param  {obj}
         * @return {void}
         */
        if (dropdownTriggerAlt) {
            dropdownTriggerAlt.onclick = function (event) {
                event.preventDefault();
                dropdownAlt.classList.toggle('is-active');
            }
        }

        /**
         * Profile dropdown mobile.
         *
         * @param  {obj}
         * @return {void}
         */
        if (dropdownTriggerMobile) {
            dropdownTriggerMobile.onclick = function (event) {
                event.preventDefault();
                dropdownAlt.classList.toggle('is-active');
            }
        }
        if (notificationsDropdownTrigger) {
            notificationsDropdownTrigger.onclick = function (event) {
                event.preventDefault();
                notificationsDropdown.classList.toggle('is-active');
            }
        }
    });

</script>


<script>
    function getCookie(name) {
        let cookieValue = null;
        if (document.cookie && document.cookie !== '') {
            const cookies = document.cookie.split(';');
            for (let i = 0; i < cookies.length; i++) {
                const cookie = cookies[i].trim();
                // Does this cookie string begin with the name we want?
                if (cookie.substring(0, name.length + 1) === (name + '=')) {
                    cookieValue = decodeURIComponent(cookie.substring(name.length + 1));
                    break;
                }
            }
        }
        return cookieValue;
    }

    function setCookie(cname, cvalue, exdays) {
        const d = new Date();
        d.setTime(d.getTime() + (exdays * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
        let expires = "expires=" + d.toUTCString();
        document.cookie = cname + "=" + cvalue + ";" + expires + ";path=/";
    }
</script>

<script>
    $( document ).ready(function() {
        if( $('#meteo-link').length )         // use this if you are using id to check
        {

                cache: false,

                xhrFields: {
                    'withCredentials': false
                },
                success: function(data, textStatus, jqXHR) {
                    $("#meteo-link").html(data);
                },
                dataType:"html"
            });

        }
    });

</script>

 <script>

        function formWriteUs() {
            $("#div-form-data-js").html('In caricamento...');
            $("#defaultModal").modal('show');
            $.ajax({
                type: 'GET',
                url: '/profiles/write_us/',
                success: function (msg) {
                    $("#div-form-data-js").html(msg);
                    $("#defaultModal").modal('show');
                },
            });
        };

        function writeUsFormSubmit(url) {
            $("#profile-data-saving-msg").show();
            var form_data =  $('#data_change_form').serialize()
            form_data.key ="csrfmiddlewaretoken"
            form_data.value = getCookie('csrftoken')
            $.ajax({
                type: "POST",
                url: url,
                data:form_data,
                success: function (msg) {
                    if (msg.ok) {
                        if(msg.result_message){$("#div-form-data-js").html(msg.result_message)};
                        setTimeout(function () {
                            $('#defaultModal').modal('hide');
                        }, 3000);
                        } else {
                            $("#profile-data-saving-msg").hide();
                            $("#div-form-data-js").html(msg.html);
                        }
                    },
            });
            return false;
        };

    </script>

<div class="position-fixed start-50 translate-middle-x" style="z-index: 11; top:9%">
    <div id="liveToast" class="toast hide" role="alert" aria-live="assertive" aria-atomic="true" style="width: 100%">
        <div class="toast-header">
            <p class="m-0"><i></i></p>
            <p class="me-auto toast-body m-0 p-0"></p>

            <button type="button" class="btn-close" data-bs-dismiss="toast" aria-label="Close"></button>
        </div>

    </div>
</div>

<script>


    $(document).ready(function () {
        check_object_in_bookmark();
        $('a[name="btn_bookmark"]').click(save_object_in_bookmark);
        $("#liveToast").toast({
            autohide: true,
            delay: 5000,
        });
    });


    function check_object_in_bookmark() {
        var a_list = $('a[name=btn_bookmark]');
        var story_list = [];
        for (var i = 0; i < a_list.length; i++) {
            var a = a_list[i];
            story_list.push({
                story_id: a.getAttribute('data-story_id'),
                content_type_id: a.getAttribute('data-content_type_id')
            });
        }
        $.ajax({
            type: 'POST',
            url: '/mediaon_fan/check_object_in_bookmark/',
            data: {
                'story_list': JSON.stringify(story_list)
            },
            success: function (response) {
                if (response.ok) {
                    for (var story_id in response.bookmarked) {
                        var color = '';
                        var a = $('.bookmark_' + story_id);
                        var img = a.find('img');
                        if (a.attr('data-color')) {
                            color = a.attr('data-color');
                        }
                        img.attr('title', response.bookmarked[story_id]['message']);
                        if (response.bookmarked[story_id]['is_bookmarked']) {
                            img.attr('src', "/static/v3/assets/images/svg/bookmark-fill.svg");
                            a.attr("data-confirm", 1);
                        }
                        a.removeAttr('hidden');

                    }
                } 
            }
        });




    }

    function save_object_in_bookmark() {
        var content_type_id = $(this).attr('data-content_type_id');
        var story_id = $(this).attr('data-story_id');
        var a = $(this)

        var img = $(this).find('img');
        var continue_ = true;

        if ($(this).attr('data-confirm') == 1 && confirm("Sei sicuro di rimuovere l'articolo dai tuoi preferiti?") != true) {
            continue_ = false;
        }

        if (continue_) {
            $.ajax({
                type: 'GET',
                url: '/mediaon_fan/save_object_in_bookmark/',
                data: {
                    'content_type_id': content_type_id,
                    'story_id': story_id
                },
                success: function (response) {
                    if (response.ok) {
                        icon_type = 'fa fa-check-circle';
                        bg_color = 'bg-success text-white';
                        if (response.saved) {
                            img.attr('src', "/static/v3/assets/images/svg/bookmark-fill.svg");
                            img.attr('title', 'Articolo salvato');
                            a.attr("data-confirm", 1);

                        } else {
                            img.attr('src', "/static/v3/assets/images/svg/icon-save.svg");
                            img.attr('title', 'Clicca e salva per leggerlo successivamente');
                            a.attr("data-confirm", 0);
                        }

                    } else {
                        icon_type = 'fa fa-exclamation-circle';
                        bg_color = 'bg-danger text-white'
                    }

                    $('.toast .toast-header p i').addClass(icon_type);
                    $('.toast .toast-header').addClass(bg_color);
                    $('.toast .toast-body').html(response.message);
                    $(".toast").toast("show");


                }
            });
        }
    }


</script>





    



<script async src="https://ads.sesaab.it/www/delivery/asyncjs.php"></script>


<script type="text/javascript">
    var application = null;
    var tcDataApi;
    var GDPR;
    var GDPR_CONSENT;
    var preroll_loc;
    preroll_loc = "icl_ros_preroll"
    
        preroll_loc += "_dsk"
        is_mobile = false
    


    try {
        window.__tcfapi('getTCData', 2, (tcData, success) => {
            if (success) {
                tcDataApi = tcData
            }
        }, []);
    } catch (e) {
        console.log(e);
    }

    window.onload = function () {
        videoElement = document.querySelectorAll('.embed_video');
        if (tcDataApi) {
            GDPR = 0

            if (tcDataApi.gdprApplies) {
                GDPR = 1
            }
            GDPR_CONSENT = tcDataApi.tcString
        }

        videoElement.forEach(function (item) {
            adTagUrl = "https://ad91.neodatagroup.com/ad/opq.jsp?loc=" + preroll_loc + "&bt=n&wt=n&rlp=gdpr:" + GDPR + "^gdpr_consent:" + GDPR_CONSENT
            application = new Application(item, adTagUrl);
        })
    };
</script>
<script>
    /**
     * Handles user interaction and creates the player and ads controllers.
     */

    const Application = function (video, adTagUrl_) {

        
        var adContainer = document.createElement("div");

        if (!video.id) {
            try {
                video.id = Math.floor(Math.random() * 99999999999);
            } catch (e) {
                console.error(e);
            }
        }

        adContainer.className = "adContainer_" + video.id;

        video.parentNode.insertBefore(adContainer, video.nextSibling);
        this.playing_ = false;
        this.adsActive_ = false;
        this.adsDone_ = false;
        this.fullscreen = false;
        this.adContainer = document.getElementsByClassName("adContainer_" + video.id)[0];
        this.videoPlayerContainer_ = video.parentNode;
        this.overlayApplication = video.parentNode.getElementsByClassName("overlay-cont")[0];
        this.videoPlayer_ = new myVideoPlayer(video);

        this.video = video;

        if (typeof (this.videoPlayer_.videoPlayerContainer_) === 'object') {
            try {
                this.videoPlayerContainer_.addEventListener(
                    'click', this.bind_(this, this.onClick_), false);
            } catch (e) {
                video.setAttribute("controls", "true");
                if (this.adContainer)
                    this.adContainer.style.display = "none";
                if (this.overlayApplication)
                    this.overlayApplication.style.display = "none";
                video.addEventListener("play", this.bind_(this, this.onClick_), false);
            }

            this.ads_ = new Ads(this, this.videoPlayer_);
            this.adTagUrl_ = adTagUrl_;
            this.videoEndedCallback_ = this.bind_(this, this.onContentEnded_);
            this.setVideoEndedCallbackEnabled(true);
        } else {
            video.setAttribute("controls", "true");
            if (this.adContainer)
                this.adContainer.style.display = "none";
            if (this.overlayApplication)
                this.overlayApplication.style.display = "none";
        }


    };

    /**
     * Registers or removes video ended callback based on the 'enable' param.
     * @param {boolean} enable
     */
    Application.prototype.setVideoEndedCallbackEnabled = function (enable) {
        if (enable) {
            this.videoPlayer_.registerVideoEndedCallback(this.videoEndedCallback_);
        } else {
            this.videoPlayer_.removeVideoEndedCallback(this.videoEndedCallback_);
        }
    };

    /**
     * Handles resuming content following ads.
     */
    Application.prototype.resumeAfterAd = function () {
        this.videoPlayer_.play();
        this.adsActive_ = false;
    };

    /**
     * Handles pausing content for ad breaks.
     */
    Application.prototype.pauseForAd = function () {
        this.adsActive_ = true;
        this.playing_ = true;
        this.videoPlayer_.pause();
    };

    /**
     * Pauses video on ad clicks.
     */
    Application.prototype.adClicked = function () {
        /* fa in modo che non si fermi l'ad perch avendo tolto il tasto di play in sovraimpressione, non c'era modo di rifarlo partire altrimenti*/
        this.ads_.resume();
        /* con il click sull'ad, il playing  a true e quindi quando finisce l'ad non parte il video */
        this.playing_ = false;
    };

    /**
     * Function binding helper function.
     * @param {!Object} thisObj object to bind function.
     * @param {!Function} fn function being bound to object.
     * @return {!Function} returns the bound function.
     */
    Application.prototype.bind_ = function (thisObj, fn) {
        return function () {
            fn.apply(thisObj, arguments);
        };
    };

    /**
     * Handles pausing the content or ads for ad clicks.
     */
    Application.prototype.onClick_ = function () {
        if (this.videoPlayer_.overlay) {
            this.videoPlayer_.overlay.style.display = "none";
        }


        var source = this.video.getElementsByTagName("source");
        if (source && source.length > 0 && source[0].getAttribute("src")) {
            play_clicked(this.videoPlayer_);
            if (!this.adsDone_) {
                this.ads_.initialUserAction();
                this.videoPlayer_.preloadContent(this.bind_(this, this.loadAds_));
                this.adsDone_ = true;
                return;
            }

            if (this.adsActive_) {
                if (this.playing_) {
                    this.ads_.pause();
                } else {
                    this.ads_.resume();
                }
            } else {
                if (this.playing_) {
                    this.videoPlayer_.pause();
                } else {

                    this.videoPlayer_.play();
                }
                if (this.videoPlayer_.overlay) {
                    this.videoPlayer_.overlay.style.display = "none";
                }
            }
        } else {
            this.video.setAttribute("controls", "true");
            if (this.video.dataset["videoLocation"]) {
                window.location.href = "#" + this.video.dataset["videoLocation"];
            }

        }

        this.playing_ = !this.playing_;
    }


    /**
     * Removes the 'loadedmetadata' listener and makes the ad request.
     */
    Application.prototype.loadAds_ = function () {
        this.videoPlayer_.removePreloadListener();
        this.ads_.requestAds(this.adTagUrl_);
    };

    /**
     * Handles resizing ads and content during fullscreen button clicks.
     */


    /**
     * Resizes ads for fullscreen.
     */
    Application.prototype.makeAdsFullscreen_ = function () {
        this.ads_.resize(this.fullscreenWidth, this.fullscreenHeight);
    };

    /**
     * Makes call to update UI on content ending.
     */
    Application.prototype.onContentEnded_ = function () {
        this.ads_.contentEnded();

    };


    var myVideoPlayer = function (video) {
        try {

            this.contentPlayer = document.getElementById(video.id);
            this.adContainer = document.getElementsByClassName("adContainer_" + video.id)[0];
            this.video = video;
            this.videoId = video.dataset['videoId'];
            this.videoContentType = video.dataset['contentTypeId'];
            this.played = false;
            this.videoPlayerContainer_ = video.parentNode;
            this.overlay = video.parentNode.getElementsByClassName("overlay-cont")[0];

            this.width = "100%";
            this.height = "100%";

        } catch (e) {
            console.log("ATTENZIONE ERRORE");
            console.warn(e);
        }
    };

    myVideoPlayer.prototype.preloadContent = function (contentLoadedAction) {

        if (this.isMobilePlatform()) {
            this.preloadListener_ = contentLoadedAction;
            this.contentPlayer.addEventListener(
                'loadedmetadata', contentLoadedAction, false);
            this.contentPlayer.load();
        } else {
            contentLoadedAction();
        }
    };

    myVideoPlayer.prototype.removePreloadListener = function () {
        if (this.preloadListener_) {
            this.contentPlayer.removeEventListener(
                'loadedmetadata', this.preloadListener_, false);
            this.preloadListener_ = null;
        }
    };

    myVideoPlayer.prototype.play = function () {
        this.contentPlayer.setAttribute("controls", "true");
        this.contentPlayer.play();
        this.adContainer.firstElementChild.style.zIndex = "-1000";


    };

    myVideoPlayer.prototype.pause = function () {
        this.contentPlayer.pause();

    };

    myVideoPlayer.prototype.isMobilePlatform = function () {
        return this.contentPlayer.paused &&
            (navigator.userAgent.match(/(iPod|iPhone|iPad)/) ||
                navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase().indexOf('android') > -1);
    };

    myVideoPlayer.prototype.resize = function (position, top, left, width, height) {
        this.videoPlayerContainer_.style.position = position;
        this.videoPlayerContainer_.style.top = top + 'px';
        this.videoPlayerContainer_.style.left = left + 'px';
        this.videoPlayerContainer_.style.width = width + 'px';
        this.videoPlayerContainer_.style.height = height + 'px';
        this.contentPlayer.style.width = width + 'px';
        this.contentPlayer.style.height = height + 'px';
    };

    myVideoPlayer.prototype.registerVideoEndedCallback = function (callback) {
        this.contentPlayer.addEventListener('ended', callback, false);
    };

    myVideoPlayer.prototype.removeVideoEndedCallback = function (callback) {
        this.contentPlayer.removeEventListener('ended', callback, false);
    };


    /**
     * Shows how to use the IMA SDK to request and display ads.
     */
    var Ads = function (application, myVideoPlayer) {
        try {
            this.application_ = application;
            this.videoPlayer_ = myVideoPlayer;
            this.contentCompleteCalled_ = false;
            google.ima.settings.setDisableCustomPlaybackForIOS10Plus(true);
            this.adDisplayContainer_ = new google.ima.AdDisplayContainer(
                this.videoPlayer_.adContainer, this.videoPlayer_.contentPlayer);
            this.adsLoader_ = new google.ima.AdsLoader(this.adDisplayContainer_);
            this.adsManager_ = null;
            this.adsLoader_.addEventListener(
                google.ima.AdsManagerLoadedEvent.Type.ADS_MANAGER_LOADED,
                this.onAdsManagerLoaded_, false, this);
            this.adsLoader_.addEventListener(
                google.ima.AdErrorEvent.Type.AD_ERROR, this.onAdError_, false, this);

            this.videoPlayer_.adContainer.firstElementChild.style.width = "100%";
            this.videoPlayer_.adContainer.firstElementChild.style.height = "100%";
        } catch (e) {
            console.warn("Errore ADS > " + e);
        }
    };


    Ads.prototype.initialUserAction = function () {
        try {
            this.adDisplayContainer_.initialize();
            this.videoPlayer_.contentPlayer.load();
        } catch (err) {
            console.warn(err);

            this.videoPlayer_.adContainer.style.zIndex = "-100";
        }
    };

    Ads.prototype.requestAds = function (adTagUrl) {
        try {
            var adsRequest = new google.ima.AdsRequest();
        } catch (e) {
            console.log(e);
            this.application_.video.setAttribute("controls", "true");
            if (this.application_.adContainer) {
                this.application_.adContainer.style.display = "none";
            }
            if (this.application_.overlayApplication) {
                this.application_.overlayApplication.style.display = "none";
            }
            this.application_.video.play();
        }

        adsRequest.adTagUrl = adTagUrl;
        adsRequest.linearAdSlotWidth = this.videoPlayer_.width;
        adsRequest.linearAdSlotHeight = this.videoPlayer_.height;
        adsRequest.nonLinearAdSlotWidth = this.videoPlayer_.width;
        adsRequest.nonLinearAdSlotHeight = this.videoPlayer_.height;
        this.adsLoader_.requestAds(adsRequest);
    };

    Ads.prototype.pause = function () {
        if (this.adsManager_) {
            this.adsManager_.pause();
        }
    };

    Ads.prototype.resume = function () {
        if (this.adsManager_) {
            this.adsManager_.resume();
        }
    };

    Ads.prototype.resize = function (width, height) {
        if (this.adsManager_) {
            this.adsManager_.resize(width, height, google.ima.ViewMode.FULLSCREEN);
        }
    };

    Ads.prototype.contentEnded = function () {
        this.contentCompleteCalled_ = true;
        this.adsLoader_.contentComplete();
    };

    Ads.prototype.onAdsManagerLoaded_ = function (adsManagerLoadedEvent) {

        var adsRenderingSettings = new google.ima.AdsRenderingSettings();
        adsRenderingSettings.restoreCustomPlaybackStateOnAdBreakComplete = true;
        this.adsManager_ = adsManagerLoadedEvent.getAdsManager(
            this.videoPlayer_.contentPlayer, adsRenderingSettings);
        this.startAdsManager_(this.adsManager_);
    };

    Ads.prototype.startAdsManager_ = function (adsManager) {


        adsManager.addEventListener(
            google.ima.AdEvent.Type.CONTENT_PAUSE_REQUESTED,
            this.onContentPauseRequested_, false, this);
        adsManager.addEventListener(
            google.ima.AdEvent.Type.CONTENT_RESUME_REQUESTED,
            this.onContentResumeRequested_, false, this);

        adsManager.addEventListener(
            google.ima.AdErrorEvent.Type.AD_ERROR, this.onAdError_, false, this);
        var events = [
            google.ima.AdEvent.Type.ALL_ADS_COMPLETED, google.ima.AdEvent.Type.CLICK,
            google.ima.AdEvent.Type.COMPLETE,
            google.ima.AdEvent.Type.LOADED,
            google.ima.AdEvent.Type.PAUSED, google.ima.AdEvent.Type.STARTED
        ];
        for (var index in events) {
            adsManager.addEventListener(events[index], this.onAdEvent_, false, this);
        }

        var initWidth, initHeight;
        if (this.application_.fullscreen) {
            initWidth = this.application_.fullscreenWidth;
            initHeight = this.application_.fullscreenHeight;
        } else {
            initWidth = this.videoPlayer_.width;
            initHeight = this.videoPlayer_.height;
        }

        adsManager.init(initWidth, initHeight, google.ima.ViewMode.NORMAL);
        adsManager.start();

    };

    Ads.prototype.onContentPauseRequested_ = function () {
        this.application_.pauseForAd();
        this.application_.setVideoEndedCallbackEnabled(false);
    };

    Ads.prototype.onContentResumeRequested_ = function () {
        this.application_.setVideoEndedCallbackEnabled(true);

        if (!this.contentCompleteCalled_) {
            this.application_.resumeAfterAd();
        }
    };

    Ads.prototype.onAdEvent_ = function (adEvent) {

        if (adEvent.type == "allAdsCompleted") {
            this.application_.playing_ = false;
            this.videoPlayer_.adContainer.style.zIndex = "-1000";
            this.videoPlayer_.adContainer.firstElementChild.style.zIndex = "-1000";
            this.videoPlayer_.overlay.style.display = "none";

        }

        if (adEvent.type == google.ima.AdEvent.Type.CLICK) {
            this.application_.adClicked();
        } else if (adEvent.type == google.ima.AdEvent.Type.LOADED) {
            var ad = adEvent.getAd();
            if (!ad.isLinear()) {
                this.onContentResumeRequested_();
            }
        }
    };

    Ads.prototype.onAdError_ = function (adErrorEvent) {
        console.log('Ad error: ' + adErrorEvent.getError().toString());

        if (this.adsManager_) {
            this.adsManager_.destroy();
        }
        this.videoPlayer_.overlay.style.display = "none";
        this.videoPlayer_.adContainer.style.zIndex = "-1000";
        this.application_.resumeAfterAd();

    };

    function play_clicked(myVideoPlayer) {
        if (myVideoPlayer.played === false && myVideoPlayer.videoId) {

            $.ajax("/counters/video/play/?object_id=" + myVideoPlayer.videoId + "&content_type_id=" + myVideoPlayer.videoContentType + '&referrer=' + escape(document.referrer), {
                cache: false,
                crossDomain: false,
                xhrFields: {
                    'withCredentials': false
                },
                success: function (data, textStatus, jqXHR) {
                    myVideoPlayer.played = true;
                },
                dataType: "json"
            });
        }
    }

</script>


    


<script src="/static/js/htmx.2.0.4.min.js"></script>

                cache: false,
                crossDomain: false,
                xhrFields: {
                    'withCredentials': false

                dataType:"json"
            });
